body_html: For future reference, switching to ipl64 MKL causes conflict with numpy, which use ip64 MKL. Also, if anyone wants to solve this in future, be aware that a large codemod is needed to rename real because MKL headers define a variable named real.
body_text: For future reference, switching to ipl64 MKL causes conflict with numpy, which use ip64 MKL. Also, if anyone wants to solve this in future, be aware that a large codemod is needed to rename real because MKL headers define a variable named real.
body: For future reference, switching to ipl64 MKL causes conflict with numpy, which use ip64 MKL. Also, if anyone wants to solve this in future, be aware that a large codemod is needed to rename `real` because MKL headers define a variable named `real`.
